page.title: 05COMPUTERS IN INDUSTRY
page.content: { Aegon}is a Dutch company based in Edenbridge with 200 employees, 16 of whom are computer operators working from 8.00am until 5.00pm.They have one mainframe computer costing Â£500,000 alone and it has 2000k of memory. The company computer was bought from ICL from where they get all there supplies. {Aegon}don't deal with life assurance, but are concerned with much larger businesses such as shipping companies and racehorse owners. In the computer room they have an air conditioner to keep the computer room cool .The temperature should always be right or else if it goes over the computer will malfunction and there could be a fire. If this occurs a ventilating gas system will extinguish the fire and automatically turns the computer off..by Paul Jenner
